fields.name: unshareResources
submitAssignment
fields.description:
Set `learnosity_session.submitted_at` value when a student submits a session.

Also responsible for completing the loop for mcq submissions in a developers local environment.

args.name: allowedPracticeExams
args.description: List of allowed practice exams tags. If provided, questions with those tags are included  in the pool even if they are part of a practice exam.

args.name: excludeInterval
args.description: Filter questions used in the past `exclude_interval` days

args.name: frqLength
args.description: The number of FRQ questions to be added to the quiz.

args.name: ignoreErrors
args.description: Should quiz creation continue even if errors are encountered

args.name: mcqLength
args.description: The number of MCQ questions to be added to the quiz.

args.name: number
args.description: The number of assessments to create.

args.name: saveReport
args.description: Should details about quizzes generation be saved on S3

args.name: useDefaultConfiguration
args.description: Flag which indicates if the quiz should be build using the default configuration

args.name: itemId
args.description: The ID of the item to retire. The endpoint will retire the `published` revision

fields.name: savePlayerSessionAuditLog
fields.description:
A GraphQL mutation for saving audit logs of a player's session.

Arguments:
- `assignment_id` (int, required): The unique identifier of the assignment
  associated with the player's session log.
- `user_agent` (str, required): The user agent string that identifies the user's device.
- `session_status` (str, required): The status of the player's session.

Returns:
- `ok` (Boolean): Indicates whether the session audit log was saved successfully.

Example:
```
GraphQL Mutation:
mutation SavePlayerSessionAuditLog($assignmentId: Int!, $ipAddress: String!, $userAgent: String!,
$sessionStatus: String!) {
    savePlayerSessionAuditLog(assignmentId: $assignmentId, ipAddress: $ipAddress, userAgent: $userAgent,
    sessionStatus: $sessionStatus) {  # noqa: E501
        ok
    }
}
```
